bug.author: PhilipMay
bug.description:
I am executing this example on Colab: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/blob/master/examples/embeddings_extraction.py>https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/blob/master/examples/embeddings_extraction.py</denchmark-link>
!git clone https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM.git %cd FARM !pip install -r requirements.txt !pip install --editable .
from farm.infer import Inferencer from farm.utils import set_all_seeds from pathlib import Path
def embeddings_extraction(): set_all_seeds(seed=42) batch_size = 32 use_gpu = False lang_model = "bert-base-german-cased" # or local path: # lang_model = Path("../saved_models/farm-bert-base-cased-squad2")
# Input basic_texts = [ {"text": "Schartau sagte dem Tagesspiegel, dass Fischer ein Idiot ist"}, {"text": "Martin MÃ¼ller spielt Fussball"}, ]
# Load model, tokenizer and processor directly into Inferencer model = Inferencer.load(lang_model, task_type="embeddings", gpu=use_gpu, batch_size=batch_size, extraction_strategy="reduce_mean", extraction_layer=-2, num_processes=0)
# Get embeddings for input text (you can vary the strategy and layer) result = model.inference_from_dicts(dicts=basic_texts) print(result)
embeddings_extraction() and get this error: <denchmark-code>06/02/2020 17:53:44 - INFO - farm.utils - device: cuda n_gpu: 1, distributed training: False, automatic mixed precision training: None 06/02/2020 17:53:44 - INFO - farm.infer - Could not find `bert-base-german-cased` locally. Try to download from model hub ... 06/02/2020 17:53:45 - INFO - transformers.modeling_utils - loading weights file https://s3.amazonaws.com/models.huggingface.co/bert/bert-base-german-cased-pytorch_model.bin from cache at /root/.cache/torch/transformers/e32f648561b03f77a129832928b7f16decdc5e0870f1e6558857e046169d4133.4e5eda3a0f09b32a0b7d1a9185034da1b3506d5c5b0c6880a7ca0122ab5eef2e 06/02/2020 17:53:48 - INFO - farm.modeling.language_model - Automatically detected language from language model name: german
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AssertionError Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-4-a645b75b7ef6> in <module>() 25 print(result) 26 ---> 27 embeddings_extraction()
3 frames
/content/FARM/farm/modeling/adaptive_model.py in __init__(self, language_model, prediction_heads, embeds_dropout_prob, lm_output_types, device, loss_aggregation_fn) 257 [lm_output_types] if isinstance(lm_output_types, str) else lm_output_types 258 ) --> 259 assert len(self.lm_output_types) == len(self.prediction_heads) 260 self.log_params() 261 # default loss aggregation function is a simple sum (without using any of the optional params)
AssertionError: </denchmark-code>
Which should not happen.

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting this issue. We are working on this in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/FARM/pull/394>#394</denchmark-link>
